div.div: Welcome to North St. Francois R-1 School District. Home of the RAIDERS!

div.class: so-panel widget widget_mtphr-dnt-widget mtphr-dnt-widget panel-first-child panel-last-child

div.strong: ***Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, North County Schools will be closed starting March 18 and will extend through the end of the school year. To read the updated letter detailing the situation released by the MAAA Superintendent Association, click here.***
Welcome to North County R-1’s website! Home of the Raiders!
Watch this ticker for your up to the minute district news, headlines, and announcements.
Parents of athletes: If you would like to purchase professionally taken action photos of your athlete, go to the athletics page and click Shop to see the available photos.
Remember to follow us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/ncraiders!

div.p:
High School FAQ Click Here
May 15: Last Day of School
Please click "More Information" regarding bus information.
Please click "More Information" regarding how severe weather affects North County School District.

div.class: pum pum-overlay pum-theme-1645 pum-theme-framed-border popmake-overlay click_open
pum-container popmake theme-1645 pum-responsive pum-responsive-small responsive size-small

div.p: We recognize that many students depend on the school district for breakfast and lunch. Together with our food service company, we have created a plan to continue serving these students. Please complete the survey to sign up in order to receive breakfast and lunch.

Beginning March 23rd, we will be handing out pre-packaged meals at the following locations during the times identified. Students will be given lunch for that day and breakfast for the next morning. All meals will be provided FREE to any child between the ages of 0-18 who is a resident of North County R-I. These free meals are provided through the Summer School Food Service Program.
Terre Du Lac Utilities Parking Lot 10:30-11:30
Lakeside General Store at Lake Timberline 11:00-11:30

div.class: pum pum-overlay pum-theme-1645 pum-theme-framed-border popmake-overlay auto_open click_open
pum-container popmake theme-1645 pum-responsive pum-responsive-small responsive size-small

p.b: Re: Food Service & Distance Learning Packet Pick Up/Delivery

span.b: Beginning on Monday, April 6th the North County School Closure Lunch & Breakfast Program will move its Pick Up and Delivery days to Mondays and Thursdays only.

br.span: This is to help improve our standards for social distancing. Reminder, we are requesting that delivery is only made for families that are unable to go to a pick up location.
br.b: Families will still be able to receive the same 5 breakfasts and lunches per week.
br.span: Pick up/delivery locations and times will remain the same (See our District Website or Facebook page for details). During our previously scheduled Easter break, we will deliver meals on Thursday, April 9th & Monday, April 13th. An example of a weekly menu will be as follows.

p.span: will include meals for the following 3 days: Monday – a hot lunch and breakfast, Tuesday – a deli style sandwich lunch and breakfast, and Wednesday – a pre-packaged lunch and breakfast.
will include meals for the following 2 days: Thursday – hot lunch and breakfast and Friday – a deli style sandwich lunch and breakfast

span.b: Beginning on Thursday, April 9th Distance Learning Paper Packets will be available for Pick up/Delivery.

br.span: These packets are being made available for any child who does not have internet access. Children with internet availability can access all of their learning materials through on-line resources provided by their teachers.
br.b: The Distance Learning Packets will be delivered with the Thursday food service program.
br.span: Again, we ask that any family that is able to pick up a packet, please use one of our 10 pick up areas located around our district. If your family is unable to go to a nearby pick up location, you may sign up for delivery by calling the North County Transportation Department at 573-431-3300 ext. 1 & then 3.

b.i: North St. Francois County R-1 School District
